about_the_game:
Stranded Island is a gripping multiplayer survival horror game where reality twists and nightmares come alive. Trapped on a mysterious island, evade an unseen killer and  light fire camps for safety. Explore breathtaking landscapes, manage resources, and outsmart a force that bends your reality. Will you escape, or will the island claim you?

In 2013, a group of kids embarked on what was supposed to be an ordinary trip, but it turned into an unforgettable nightmare. A sudden, strange weather phenomenon cut off all communication, leaving them isolated on a mysterious island. What started as a fun day of exploring, playing, and bonding turned into a horrifying experience no one could fully explain.

Through fragmented memories and haunting testimonies, survivors describe a chilling entity—a killer that was there but not there, a force pulling them into a twisted mix of shared reality and personal nightmares. They ran without knowing why, driven by fear they could neither see nor name.

Step into their shoes. Team up with friends to survive the island’s surreal terror. Light fires to create safe zones, search for valuable items to barter your way off the island.

But beware: your flashlight’s dying light is your only shield in the darkness, and the killer’s presence bends reality in ways you can't anticipate.

How to play-

  • Select a server, if your playing with friends it should be the same as your friends server, to select a server use the button at the bottom of the main menu screen. 

  • Proceed to join or create room if with friends or know a room name and join random room if you want to join a random room with no friends. 

  • Once connected wait for everyone to be complete before you start. 

  • You have a chat option in game to be able to chat in the main menu as well as in the game, press enter to type and to send. 

  • Visit the journal in game settings and learn all the basics. 

Features-

Realistic sounds and ambient sounds. 

Immersive Survival Gameplay - Explore a hauntingly beautiful island with mountain views, glowing fireflies, and chilling soundscapes.

Junks - search for abandoned items that are worth that are worth gold, sliver or bronze coins value. 

Boat man - pay the fisher man to take you off the island back home. 

Safe zones - locate the fire camps on the map and lit them on to prevent the killer from hunting you. 

Static Map - use your geographic skills together with the map to locate certain points on the island. 

Journal - information that would help you play the game easily, is given to you so you focus on having fun and screaming as much as you can. 

Technology 

Flashlight 

dying light, use your battery life wisely so you can hide your aura from your killer when outside the zones. 

Charging point

locate the charge house and charge your flashlight before it dies. 

Metal detector 

strapped to your body, helps you to detect if a metal is close by in a circular range look at the ground. 

Multiplayer 

Play with strangers or play with your friends, from 2 up to 6 players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 64Bits
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4590/ AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 /AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: This low specs is what was available for testing, it might perform well on lower specs.

  • Memory: 8 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
